fingerprint: Survey 580-1P, House 15/116-12, Assessment 1072002023, 145.2 Sq.Yds, Partition Deed 4163/2019, Schedule-C property, ACTIVE MORTGAGE 1116/2020 with Vistaar Finance, Mutation NOT completed, Tax in deceased name
ec_summary: EC shows complex history: (1) Original acquisition 21/1964 by Naragani Veera Ragavaiah, (2) Partition 4163/2019 among 4 family members (3 sons + 1 daughter), (3) ACTIVE Deposit of Title Deeds 1116/2020 with Vistaar Financial Services Gudivada. Multiple partition entries [A][B][C][D] for different schedules.
review_notes: L2 accepted as BT case. Report correctly identified: (1) Active mortgage with Vistaar Finance - internal BT, receipt deed not insisted, (2) Mutation not completed - tax still in deceased father Naragani Pydayya's name, (3) Death certificates for father attached (mother's DC not available but Saral policy relaxation applied), (4) Partition among family members with Schedule-C going to Veerababu. Conclusion correctly states 'Subject to Discharge of Active Mortgage'.
exceptions: For internal BT (mortgage with same FI): Do not insist on receipt deed - FI to verify internally. Tax receipt in deceased person's name is acceptable IF disclosed in report and FI advised to verify. Missing mother's death certificate acceptable under Saral policy. Multiple EC entries [A][B][C][D] for partition are normal - each schedule item gets separate entry.
flow_summary: Naragani Veera Ragavaiah (original owner via 21/1964) → [oral partition pre-1984] → Naragani Pydayya (father, died 24-Mar-2010) → [Hindu succession] → Naragani Sivayya + Krishna Kumar + Veerababu + Peddi Parvathi → [Partition 4163/2019] → Naragani Veerababu (Schedule-C: 145.2 Sq.Yds with house) → [Mortgage 1116/2020] → Vistaar Finance (ACTIVE)
